mapper.select: select INVOICE_NO, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_DATE, INVOICE_DUEDATE, INVOCIE_PNAME, INVOCIE_PADDRESS, INVOCIE_PPHONE, INVOCIE_PEMAIL, INVOCIE_PURL, INVOCIE_ITEMLIST, INVOICE_TOTALPRICE, INVOICE_STATUS, INVOICE_CANCELDATE, INVOICE_CANCELREASON from invoice order by invoice_no desc

select INVOICE_NO, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_DATE, INVOICE_DUEDATE, INVOCIE_PNAME, INVOCIE_PADDRESS, INVOCIE_PPHONE, INVOCIE_PEMAIL, INVOCIE_PURL, INVOCIE_ITEMLIST, INVOICE_TOTALPRICE, INVOICE_STATUS, INVOICE_CANCELDATE, INVOICE_CANCELREASON from invoice where INVOICE_NO = #{ino}

select TEMPLATE_ITEMNO, TEMPLATE_PARENTITEMNAME, TEMPLATE_ITEMNAME, TEMPLATE_ITEMDESCRIPTION, TEMPLATE_ITEMPRICE, PURCHASE_COUNT from templateinfo t join purchase p using(TEMPLATE_ITEMNO) where p.INVOICE_NO = #{ino} and t.TEMPLATE_STATUS = 'Y' order by t.TEMPLATE_PARENTITEMNAME

select INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_DATE, INVOICE_DUEDATE, INVOCIE_PNAME, INVOCIE_PADDRESS, INVOCIE_PPHONE, INVOCIE_PEMAIL, INVOCIE_PURL, INVOCIE_ITEMLIST, INVOICE_TOTALPRICE, INVOICE_STATUS, INVOICE_CANCELDATE, INVOICE_CANCELREASON from invoice where INVOICE_NO = #{ino}

select TEMPLATE_ITEMNO, TEMPLATE_PARENTITEMNAME, TEMPLATE_ITEMNAME, TEMPLATE_ITEMDESCRIPTION, TEMPLATE_ITEMPRICE, PURCHASE_COUNT from templateinfo t join purchase p using(TEMPLATE_ITEMNO) where p.INVOICE_NO = #{ino} and t.TEMPLATE_STATUS = 'Y' order by t.TEMPLATE_PARENTITEMNAME
select count(*) from invoice where substr(invoice_number, 1, 4) = #{str}

INSERT INTO INVOICE (INVOICE_NO, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_DATE, INVOICE_DUEDATE, INVOCIE_PNAME, INVOCIE_PADDRESS, INVOCIE_PPHONE, INVOCIE_PEMAIL, INVOCIE_PURL, INVOCIE_ITEMLIST, INVOICE_TOTALPRICE, INVOICE_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_IVNO.NEXTVAL, #{invoiceNumber}, SYSDATE, ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, +1), #{invoicePname}, #{invoicePaddress}, #{invoicePphone}, #{invoicePemail}, #{invoicePurl}, #{invoiceItemList}, #{invoiceTotalPrice}, 'Y')
INSERT INTO PURCHASE (PURCHASE_NO, PURCHASE_COUNT, TEMPLATE_ITEMNO, INVOICE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_PCNO.NEXTVAL, 1, #{tno}, #{ino})
